You can pre-define a tagging vocabulary: Terms defined in the tagging vocabulary are automatically suggested to users when they create new tags. Vocabulary terms can be associated with an ID (e.g. an alphanumberic code or URI) and a fixed color. Note that users will still be able to create their own custom tags (without ID or fixed color) in the annotation interface.
Add vocabulary terms below: Add terms to the vocabulary by pasting into the text field (one term per line). Optionally, assign an ID or URI to the tag separated by comma.
open-join-info: With 'Open Join' switched on, any registered user can join your project without an invitation.
open-edit-info: With 'Open Edit' switched on, any member of your project can edit the default assignment.
status_message: Projects can be either Active or Locked. Locked projects are read only but still accessible by the project members. Locked Public Projects cannot be joined by new members. Only Organization Admins can Unlock a project once locked.
lock_warning_message: Once a project is locked, it will become read-only for all project members, including yourself. The project will still be accessible by all project members, but no new members can be added. Only an Organization Admin can undo this action.
unlock_message: When a project is unlocked, there will be no project administrators. Be sure to designate one on the Teams page.
Right panel will be closed by default wh: Right panel will be closed by default when opening a document
Right panel will display annotations whe: Right panel will display annotations when opening a document
Right panel will display notes when open: Right panel will display notes when opening a document
Are you sure you want to lock this proje: Are you sure you want to lock this project?
